sources.title: Seven Chances (1925) HD with Score
sources.description: Struggling stockbroker Jimmie Shannon learns that, if he gets married by 7 p.m. on his 27th birthday -- which is today -- he'll inherit $7 million from an eccentric relative.

metadata.Plot: Financial broker Jimmie Shannon is nearly bankrupt when an attorney presents grandfather's will leaving him seven million dollars. In order to inherit the money Jimmie must marry before 7 pm on his 27th birthday - today!
metadata.Writer: Roi Cooper Megrue, Clyde Bruckman, Jean C. Havez
metadata.Actors: Buster Keaton, Ruth Dwyer, T. Roy Barnes
